name: EvBall
description:
Guide the neon ball to the top of the Leader board! In this exciting arcade game, your goal is to jump as many times without hitting the blocks that block your path, while scales at high speed through the walls of neon. Touch the screen to jump from wall to wall at full speed, keep jumping to go generating combos to multiply your score. Just remember, beware of obstacles. Keep your neon ball intact!

GAME FEATURES

★ Intuitive touch controls

★ Easy to play but difficult to master

★ Beautiful and colorful graphics

★ Smooth and responsive game

★ Ranking table and score share

Install EvBall today. It's free!

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.subreality.evball

___________________________________________

EvBall is a game by Reality Studio, a game studio from Dominican Republic, creators of Truck Race Underground and War of War of Imperium. Search for "RealityStudios" in Google Play store to see all our games. Follow @realitystudioRD on Twitter or our Facebook page realitystudiord for game announcements and other updates.
